User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Aris AI Therapy application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user was created.

ChatSession.title: Chat Session
ChatSession.description: Represents a single chat session or conversation.

id.description: Unique identifier for the chat session.

title.description: The title of the chat session, often the first user message.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the session was created.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in a chat session.

role.description: The role of the message sender.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the message was created.
